thread.title: Chipmaker Fairchild hires Goldman Sachs to find buyer - Bloomberg
thread.title_full: Chipmaker Fairchild hires Goldman Sachs to find buyer - Bloomberg | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Chipmaker Fairchild hires Goldman Sachs to find buyer - Bloomberg
text:
Oct 14 Fairchild Semiconductor Inc has hired Goldman Sachs Group Inc to find a buyer and is in talks with companies including ON Semiconductor Corp and Infineon Technologies AG, Bloomberg reported.
No deal is assured and a transaction isn't imminent, Bloomberg reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter. ( bloom.bg/1LaZxCm )
Fairchild was not immediately available for comment. (Reporting by Anya George Tharakan in Bengaluru; Editing by Kirti Pandey)
